sub_title: Project Manager at European Medicines Agency
summary:
I am a certified project management professional (PMP, PSM, SAFe) with 6 years of work experience. I have a solution-focused mindset, an eye for details and a heart encouraging collaboration. I have recently relocated from Hungary to the Netherlands, to work as a project manager at the European Medicines Agency.

I am experienced in managing software development life cycle (SDLC), user acceptance testing (UAT) and data migration. I have expertise in planning, scheduling, risk and change management. I engage stakeholders by focusing on solving problems, handling conflicts, and sustaining a transparent and keen documentation. During my previous roles I became adept at bank mergers and integrations, leadership, and budgeting.

I am interested in international change management projects and traveling.

awards.title: Mindspire Consultant Award: “Young Talent of the Year”
awards.description: "For his strong performance and outstanding contribution to the OTP Tara Integration Project in Montenegro, as a junior consultant, managing the PMO coordination of the whole IT Stream and earning great respect and excellent evaluations from the client and the whole project team as well, while also completing PMP certification and participating actively and helpfully in knowledge sharing and trainings."

awards.title: Mindspire Project Award: “Best Project of the Year”
awards.description: "For coordinating and supporting the PMO management on the OTP Dalmata Project in Croatia."

awards.title: ING “Striving for Excellence Award”
awards.description: "For achieving 28% operational growth in incoming professional exchange programs, and implementing customer satisfaction standards."

awards.title: Electrolux "Financial Sustainability Award"
awards.description: "For outstanding financial performance and implementing change management projects on the areas of legalities, accounting, reporting, budgeting, auditing and sustainability."

awards.title: AIESEC "Best Functional Leader Award"
awards.description: "For excellent management of customer experience for incoming professional exchange participants and volunteers."

profile_positions.description:
I have recently joined EMA as a Project Manager, to support the implementation of the Clinical Trails Information System (CTIS). I coordinated activities related to the go-live, now I am managing hyper care stabilization and transition to maintenance. I became experienced in working with ITIL and SAFe methodologies.

Responsibilities:
• providing project management support on a large software implementation program
• coordinating the planning and execution of the go-live plan
• following-up integration test execution and bug fixing
• supporting the maintenance team with the transition, documentation and communication
• organizing meetings, preparing minutes and weekly management reports
• maintaining project documents, monitoring the activities in JIRA
• collaborating with a supplier to deliver maintenance releases

Achievement:
• successful go-live execution of CTIS project within the planned deadline
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was providing project management support for banking clients to execute merger and IT transformation projects. I coordinated the work of teams in software development, data migration, testing, information security and infrastructure. I was recognized by stakeholders for being a fast communicator and always reliable in my performance.

Responsibilities:
• coordinated the IT merger of two banks in Montenegro on time and under budget
• managed 7 international teams of 50+ colleagues on-site and online
• supervised the end-to-end software development lifecycle (SDLC) for 240 items
• arranged the execution 2600+ of user acceptance test (UAT) cases, minimized defects
• administered Microsoft Project, SharePoint, Confluence and Jira platforms
• maintained project issues through milestone plans, task lists and incident log
• supported IT agile platforms like sprint planning, sprint reviews and daily stand-up meetings
• initiated 50 requests for change management to adjust scope, schedule, and costs
• implemented resource analysis, risk management and stakeholder engagement

Achievements:
• Successful integration of Podgoricka Banka into CKB
• Mindspire Consultant Award: “Young Talent of the Year”
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a PMO analyst, I was providing support on bank merger projects in Croatia and Montenegro and was in charge of coordinating Treasury and ALM working units. My ability to deliver my responsibilities on time and with high quality helped to be quickly appointed to more complex tasks.

Responsibilities:
• delivered the successful merger of two banks in Croatia
• produced status updates, held effective meetings, and facilitated decision making
• mediated between executive management and 100+ project members
• established project organization rules and designed document templates
• maintained milestone plans, task lists, decision logs and risk register
• analyzed data collected about project performance, UAT and SDLC
• supervised the change management process

Achievements:
• Successful integration of Splitska Banka into OBH (Croatia)
• Mindspire Project Award: “Best Project of the Year” for coordinating and supporting the PMO management on the OTP Dalmata Project in Croatia.
profile_positions.title: PMO

profile_positions.description: As a consultant at Mindspire Consulting plc, I was contracted for projects at OTP Bank to provide methodological and on-the-job support. To provide the best service for clients I have completed trainings in agile methodologies, project management, data migration, business analysis, system analysis, and consulting.
profile_positions.title: Project Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Being the president of the Hungarian committee meant that I could inspire the management team and the organization of 500+ volunteers towards one common vision and strategy. During this experience I could develop in team management, strategic planning and giving motivational speeches.

Responsibilities:
• leader of an association of 500+ volunteers and the executive board
• coached 11 functional directors of 3 nationalities to achieve operational results
• planned the organization’s strategy, controlled the operative plans and budget
• hosted weekly management team meetings and monthly retrospectives
• supervised change management projects
• represented the organization on international level and towards external stakeholders

Achievements:
• ING “Striving for Excellence Award” for achieving 28% operational growth in incoming professional exchange programs, and implementing customer satisfaction standards."
profile_positions.title: Country Manager of Hungarian National Office

profile_positions.description:
I was working as the Finance Manager of the local office at Corvinus University, and then got promoted to be the director of the national office. During this experience I could further improve my skills in budgeting, accounting and controlling.

Responsibilities:
• planner and cost controller of 400k EUR budget, which was 100% kept
• created the annual financial report (Balance Sheet, P&L), passed external audit
• accountant of financial and legal documentation (contracts, invoices, payroll, taxation)
• handled bookkeeping & managed account receivables in Twinfield software
• CAPEX management for projects, OPEX management
• member of executive board of 6 nationalities; led the department of 11 finance managers
• monitored profitability of services, analyzed and renewed pricing of services
• organized Central European conference for 200 delegates from 20 countries
• implemented Microsoft Office 365 suite as internal collaboration platform

Achievements:
• Electrolux "Financial Sustainability Award" for outstanding financial performance and implementing change management projects on the areas of legalities, accounting, reporting, budgeting, auditing and sustainability.
• "National Sustainability Award" for outstanding financial performance
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager of National and Local Office

profile_positions.description:
I was a team leader for coordinating over international professional exchange programs and volunteering projects focusing on education. I built on my passion for cultural diversity to organize programs and projects for over 120 foreign students.

Responsibilities:
• led 3 project teams of 4-9 members
• boosted customer experience for exchange students and local organizations
• prescreened and selected 120+ candidates for open positions
• contacted Hungarian organizations for sales and negotiation
• organized over 20 cultural and networking events

Achievements:
• Best Functional Leader Award
• Everyday Hero Award for outstanding performance
• Best Project Award
profile_positions.title: Project Team Leader
